page.title: 13RELIGION
page.content: {Religion }plays an important part in the life of the people living in Lanark. Generally the churches are well attended.The{Church of Scotlnd has three churches in the town and this is a reflection of the splits that occured in the last century . The{Church of Scotland}probably has more members than any other church.The {Catholic church}has many members and even has its own hospital as well as having a group of nuns.{The Episcopal {Church }is also active in Lanark and has a good following.There are other active Christian groups in the town of Lanark;these include such groups as the Congregational Church,the Baptist,the Quakers,the Jehovahs Witnesses and the Salvation Army.Finally there is a Christian Community that has taken over Smyllum House.
